Bash(gh release create v0.1.10 --title "v0.1.10" --notes "$(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

### UI Improvements
- **bits-ui Integration**: Migrated all modals to bits-ui Dialog components for better accessibility and consistency
- **City Combobox**: New autocomplete dropdown for city selection with "create new city" feature
- **Reusable Dialog Components**: Added Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogFooter wrapper components
- **Confirmation Dialogs**: New ConfirmDialog component for delete confirmations and other actions

### Settings Fixes
- Fixed save button that was incorrectly disabled (was checking legacy rootPath field)
- Fixed folder paths not being saved correctly to config
- Fixed confirmation dialogs not triggering properly

### Database Improvements
- Added WAL checkpoint after clearing database to ensure data is properly flushed on Windows
- Relaxed property folder validation - properties can now be imported even without INTERNET/WATERMARK folders
- Properties without workflow folders will have them created when you start working on them

### New Features
- Perspective correction feature with OpenCV integration
- BeforeAfterSlider component for image comparison
- Notification system with stores

### Bug Fixes
- Database clear now properly removes all properties
- Property scan no longer rejects folders without INTERNET/WATERMARK structure
EOF
